query:
SELECT course_id, module_number, title, CHAR_LENGTH(content) as content_length 
FROM training_modules 
WHERE course_id IN (2, 3) 
ORDER BY course_id, module_number;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT course_id, module_number, title, CHAR_LENGTH(content) as content_length 
FROM training_modules 
WHERE course_id IN (2, 3) 
ORDER BY course_id, module_number;
